verses.name: 2 Chronicles 27:1
verses.text: Jotham was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem. His mother’s name also was Jerushah, the daughter of Zadok.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 27:2
verses.text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his father Uzziah did: howbeit he entered not into the temple of the Lord. And the people did yet corruptly.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 27:3
verses.text: He built the high gate of the house of the Lord, and on the wall of Ophel he built much.
